content.detailedDescription: Hubby and i were on our way home [parts run] on hy 10,headed se from durand to mondovi.I always sky watch.We we re in the area of a wayside north of the hy.,three,four miles east of durand. there is a long wooded ridge that runs parrarel to hy. a third to half a mile north of the road, with fields in between. it  was around 8:30 pm, cloudy with no stars at the time. i saw a large white light about 100 feet above the woods. it was at lest 5 times the size of what a yard night light would be at that distance. i watched it hover for 30 to 45 seconds and had hubby look. some trees blocked our view briefly. when we could see again, the large white light was gone and 5 smaller white and 2 blue lights appeared in thee diagonal lines,spsnding 100 feet above woods to 300 feet up.Frist line,look at a clock put awhite light at 1 at the center of the hands,and at 7 oclock. next at same diagonal put a blue light 50 feet over between the thee white lights, then put 2 more white lights 50 feet over even with the bottom 2 whites lights. it was a weird shape. we saw them for 15 to 20 seconds and then they just went off, totaly dark. i had to go back for more parts the next am. in daylight, there are no towers or buildings in the area where we seen the lights, just a large woods. we have no idea as to what we saw.
content.summary: Large white light hovering above wooded ridge,half mile away, 5 times size of yard light. large light goes out,  5  white lightsand 2 blue lights appear in 3diagonal rows. then all go out.

content.detailedDescription: The night of friday, and saturday morning at 2am my sister in law calls me out side to take a look at some strange lights naturally she is kinda skittish and it was late so she went inside, as i left my apartment complex i kept my eye on the light which as i looked around i could tell there was alot more than one but they were all at some distance unlike the one i was first looking at. it seemed to come closer then move further away almost beckoning me to move closer i wasnt scared but i still wasnt sure what i was looking at cause i could see the light but nothing else i walked on a patch of grass behind the barber shop and was looking above me where the light had made its way. it seems as though a light detached itself from the main body before it put its spotlight on me which was barley decernable from the moon light cause i looked on the ground around me and didnt see it. before the light was in my eyes i saw a cloud press agianst the hull and for a split second the outline of the ship was visible. at first it seemed like the stars were slowly spining but it seems that it was cloaked predator style. there wasnt much thinking or feeling i just stared kinda in wonder but i didnt think much honestly after that it began to head north north west towards the lake close to my home town i followed it as it was leaving and when i stopped to turn around and go home it seemed to stop and flash so i continued till it daybreak when it just kept on going and abruptly the light faded and i could no longer see it. one strange change is that i am getting nodules in clusters below the skin, so far 3 of them and it seems as more are on there way i'll going to the hospital in the next day or two to get a opinion on this.
content.summary: See though with alternating lights of red and blue and main yellow light

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside to check on my horses and i looked up and notice the horizon lights over the town was red -(north)- then i turned to the left and i saw above my tree line a massive ball of thick rolling red clouds just hovering above the tree line. no sounds or noise whatsoever. from the cloud hovering over the tree line it expanded in a straight line to the right what appeared to me about a thousand feet for a minute or two, then went back to its original position leaving a heavy red mist in its path. at this time my wife, daughter, and friend are seeing this as well. i called my neighbor and he came out side and saw this as well. at this time with all the talking and yelling the red cloud started moving towards north west leaving a red mist in its trail and dissappeard. this happened on 10/24/2011 around about between 7 - 7:30 pm.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red clouds, massive, thick rolling clouds that hoverd and then moved and the clouds moved with it only leaving red mist behind.

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 6 i was in my living room and looked out the window.
then,saw a red star like object in the sky it stopped and then went faster the other direction.
content.summary: Red star like object hovering

content.detailedDescription:
My neighbor and i happened to be walking our dogs on oct 21, 2011 at 06:59 at the same time. my neighbor went up the street to the north and i went down the street to the south. he was about 20 feet from me when i stopped to let my dog go potty. i looked up to check the weather as i always do. the second i looked up an object in the sky took my attention. from my field of view standing under trees and looking above the trees across the street. this object was very large. circular at the top with the brightest lights i've ever seen, dancing in a pattern. some dim others blinding. there was one light stationary at the base of the object hanging down below it. i looked for about 5 seconds in amazement then called to my neighbor "hey you have to see this!" i pointed to the the sky. he jogged down to me, looked at it and said, "what the hell is that?!" i said i don't know but it's not right. at that point i realized i have my cell phone on me. i pulled it out and got only about 15 sec. of video. i stopped recording to take a zoom still shot. i snapped one picture. (it came out blurry.) i hate my ipone! anyway, as i was trying to put my phone back into video mode when my neighbor said, "look" i looked up and the object turned slightly horizontally on it's side and started in an arching motion to the nw over puget sound and illuminated a cloud as it disappeared behind it. the way it started it's motion was amazing and the way it increased in speed before it went behind the cloud was like watching a magnet being pushed away by another magnet. that's the only way i can explain it's foreword motion.

the video i am attaching is in no way like what we saw. it looks far away but it was much closer then is appears in the video. there were many more lights than showed up on the video. i am submitting the original. i have edited this video and the only thing i have done to it is adjust the lighting settings and did some slow motion effects. i don't know what we saw but it was strange and i've never seen anything like that is the sky my whole life. after talking to my neighbor the other day we both still concur, it was strange. you can see my edited video at
[link moved to field investigator section/cms/tg]


i called the mufon office the day of the event and talked to a guy named david that is an investigator for mufon but have not heard back from him.

i was unable to find this form until now is why the delay in my report. you have my permission to analyzed the video and use it any way you choose. i in no way am looking for publicity or financial gain.

[name removed/cms/tg]
seattle, wa
content.summary: Hovering object, patterned extremely bright lights. no sound.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving west on u.S. expressway 83 within the city limits of donna, texas, when i observed a very bright saucer-shaped object off slightly to my left (southwest of my position). the object was moving on a steady course from south to north. as it moved, it tipped slightly, revealing that it was saucer-shaped. it gave off a steady, bright white light. i continued watching it for about a minute, but while fumbling around for my cell phone to take a photo, the object had vanished when i looked back up.
content.summary: Bright saucer-shaped object moving south to north.

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 9:45 p.M. on october 21, 2011, i took my dog out, and i noticed a bright orange light in the western sky, but i dismissed it thinking it was a plane.  i was outside about a minute when i noticed several more of the lights coming behind the first one.  so i ran to the end of my driveway where i could see over the treetops, and there were seven more lights.  they were not in a straight line.  they all moved slowly, from south to north, eventually disappearing.  it was as if they burned out.  their light got smaller and smaller, until it was gone.  several of my neighbors were outside at the time, and i called to them to come out in the street and look at the lights.  they did.  and we then witnessed the event together.  after the majority of the lights were gone, one more single light "floated" into view from the direction from which all of the previous lights had come, and we stood and watched it until it disappeared.  

there were approximately ten lights altogether.  they never traveled far enough away to be out of sight, instead they seemed to burn out within a small area of a few hundred yards.  

the night sky was full of stars.  these lights were not stars.  they moved very slowly.  the pattern was something like this:

     *(last sighting)                    *     *    
                              *      *   *  *             *(first sighting)
                                        *

the total time the event lasted was approximately ten minutes.  i was excited by the experience.  i hope i see it again.
content.summary: Bright orange lights in the western sky were seen in cornelius nc on friday, october 21, 2011, at approximately 9:45 pm.

content.detailedDescription:
Oct 26, 2011
6-6:30 am est
garner, nc

i woke up and was talking to my partner who just went into the bathroom to take a shower.  i opened my blinds as i normally do, looked outside and saw a white orb just flying horizontal and then disappeared.  i called him over to see it also, he saw it.  then i put on my pants and went to the screened porch and noticed a second one, same size (white orb) taking the same path and then it just disappeared.  a lot quicker then the first one.
waited around for 20 more minutes to see if i noticed another one.  nothing else.
content.summary: 2 white orbs

content.detailedDescription: On october 22, 2011 in mesa, az around  6:40 pm, i step outside onto my porch to smoke a cigarette. the sun had just set earlier, and the sky where the sun had set was barely still showing some twilight.  just as i was sitting down into my lawn chair and started looking around in the sky, i noticed while looking towards the northwest two objects in the far distant and at high altitude.  the two objects were moving extremely slow in the sky, and the two objects appeared to be at a good distant from each other (possibly a mile apart.)  but what really caught my attention is how the two objects were moving in tandem in speed and direction.  both objects weren't really that bright in the sky; yet, it was obviously seen in the sky without too much difficulties in the beginning.  both objects had a constant lighting, and no navigation lights were seen such as a strobe, red, or green light.  the highest object seem smaller in size and not as bright as the lower object. the lower object was much brighter than the higher object.  i had a little difficult time trying to focus on the objects seen since their lighting wasn't extremely bright; especially the higher up object.  i had my camera with me so i took some pictures; but  i forgot i had the camera set at the 100 iso setting which the objects could not be seen in the 1st picture i had taken.  i quickly change the iso setting to 1600.  the camera was also giving me some difficulties, but i finally manage to get some more picture.  while looking through the telescopic lens at the larger object, i saw what look to be a triangular shape object.  there also seem to be a dim light at each corner; however, i am not absolutely positive about that, but i am absolutely sure the object was orange in color and sometimes triangular in shape.  i also thought i had the camera shutter speed set at 1.6 second; however, in my haste to take pictures, i forgotten to set the camera to manual too.  nevertheless, the camera still took pictures near the shutter speed i would had intended to utilized which the pictures still turned out somewhat ok since i was able to capture the lighting.  there was barely a breeze, and the sky was clear.  the objects appeared to traverse towards either the east or southeast.  the object when first seen was located in the northwest direction, and when the object traverse the sky and reach the northeast direction, both objects appeared to had  slow down much more.  the larger object also seemed to be almost hovering, but it was still barely moving.  the lighting intensity at that moment was barely noticeable which also made it extremely difficult to locate the object in the sky.  at one point, it almost seemed like a star since it was barely moving or just hovering.  i eventually lost track of it in trying to determine which is a star and which is the object.  the altitude the objects appear to be located in the sky was at or near the same altitude of very high flying commercial jets.  because objects moved so slowly, they didn't seem to be commercial jets traveling.  it almost seem like the objects were just slowly gliding through the air.  no noise were heard from the objects possibly due to the vast distant.  to my best estimate, the distant the objects from me may had been possibly 5 miles; however, it is also possible that the objects may had been further away in the distant  than what i could estimate correctly. the size of the larger object seems to be much bigger than a commercial jet at the height and distant i saw the objects; definitely much taller than a commercial jet in height.  the lighting appeared to be a dull orange in color and possibly a hint of yellow in it too.  the speed of the object going across the distant sky almost seemed like the speed of drifting balloons if the balloons were very near my location, or the object's speed appeared to be similar to an extremely slow plane that is flying in the far distant at low altitude.  the objects didn't appeared to be balloons; especially at the distant i seen the objects.  if they were balloons, it would had to been an extremely large balloons nearly the size of a blimp. the angle i saw the objects in the sky was about 30 degrees or higher off the horizon.
content.summary: Two orange vertically, tandem objects possibly 1 mile distant apart traversing slowly across the sky at identical speed and direction.

content.detailedDescription:
I live in cranford new jersey (union county)
longitude 70.4?

i looked out the 2nd floor window facing north and saw it....Thought my eyes were playing tricks.
so i stepped away, rubbed my eyes, put on eye glasses and it was still there! my benchmark were the planes flying over-head.

we live in flight-pattern for newark airport.
this was definately lower than the planes.

also when the planes flow over ~ it seemed to dissapear.

i saw red lights at first. then it danced, and lights blinking, but no rythem to the pattern. it moved in un-normal ways. bobbing and swooping.
it was so beautiful!
it lasted almost 25 min....So i had time to walk away and make sure my eyes were not playing tricks on me.

the very strange thing was the color behind the tall tress ~ they were illuminated from the back in shades of gray and white.
like a "black & white" photo.

i am so very lucky to have witnessed this....I have never seen anything like it in my entire life. it also has changed my life and i will never lookk at anyhting in life the same ever again.
thanks.

hope this helps with your research
content.summary: Noticed red lights first and the hovering and dancing - no rythem to lights

content.altitude: Treetop, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Driving east on ray rd, listening to the radio a low level radioactive spill occurred at the intel plant in chandler, we were both looking off to the south over the intel plant area watching a silver shaped baloon sprire type object moving around their were two objects moving over the plant with movements never seen before, we watched them for a few mins then the took off straight up in the air with incredible speed.
content.summary: A silver like baloon shape movement was never seen, hovering over the intel plant after a low leve radioactive spill..

content.detailedDescription: I was in the backyard near lockport, ny at about 8:50 p.M. on saturday, august 27, 2011 when someone drew my attention to a single bright, yellow unwavering light in the sky, to the north, that was larger than the background stars and was traveling east to west.  the sky was cloud free and the weather was calm.  it was then followed by up to 20 or 25 more items of the same type, all of which appeared to travel together in a line from east to west where they seemed to vanish in the distance.  they were extremely interesting in the way they looked and the way they traveled.  they did not travel in a distinct formation, but appeared to be in a loose traveling group moving along fairly quickly.  they appeared to hover, slow down, speed up and change direction at will, all while traveling in an east to west line.  the event lasted about 5 to 10 minutes.  they are unlike anything i've ever seen in the sky, night or day, at any previous time.  they did not appear to be a group of airplanes or a meteor shower.  i felt amazed then, and do now, and i can't wait to hear the explanation of the event because i'm sure i'll learn something new and interesting, whether the explanation involves the weather, the military, or whatever.
content.summary: Line of 25 yellow unwavering lights traveling east to west at about 8:50 pm on august 27th 2011..

content.detailedDescription: On october 21st 2011 i was visiting family out in mesa, arizona. at that time i was actually almost done my 2 week vacation and doing what i did after dinner almost every night there, which was looking up at the star constellations and showing my young 5 year old nephew what stars were which constellations when i noticed there were 2 stars out of place, they shouldn't have been in the little dipper at all. these 2 out of place stars were not there a couple minutes before when i looked up the first time after dinner before my young nephew came out. both star-like objects flew in a straight path across the sky and then disappeared, there was no sound or blinking lights like an airplane or helicopter, there was no engine sounds. there was a small airport near my brother where small planes and helicopters flew in and out of but these were 2 shining round star-like objects too far up and too bright to be airplanes or helicopters.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 starlike objects appeared in middle of star constellation and flew in a straight path then hovered again and vanished

content.detailedDescription: We were driving thru a small neighborhood on our way home from work. we come the same way every night. we noticed an amber reddish orange orb brightly lit flying towards us.It got progressively bigger because it was getting closer. we had pulled over and were had our eyes fixated on the object. it increased speed greatly for a brief moment and then kind of wobbled and slowed and then completely changed direction flying to the right of us. it then started to lose brightness and color intensity and then kind of disappeared into a small red dot and then it was gone completely. i am an avid ufo and et believer which kind of helped me to recognize the basic characteristics of a ufo as i have read in other peoples experiences. it was the 1st time i have witnessed anything that i would bet money was a ufo. we went back up the road and around again and didnt see  it again.
content.summary: Seen a light in the sky flying,, accelerated greatly in speed and wobbled and changed direction and reduced in size and dissappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was out on my front lawn looking up at the stars with my girlfriend and we were looking fo shooting stars and talking and stuff when she got a weird look on her face and said "whats that!" i looked over and at first i didnt see anything and i looked back at her kind of odd but then i looked to where she was pointing and there was something in the sky that looked like a plane at first but it wasnt moving and it had three lights that were blinking at a very slow rate. so i ran into the house and got my benoculars and i went back outside to see what kind of aircraft it was. and i was looking at this thing through x10 benoculars steadied on her shoulder and i say that the object was not moving forward or bcakwards because there was no motion up down left or right from my feild of vision and it never got smaller. then while she was calling her dad to tell him to go look outside and see if he could see this thing it shifted up several inches in perspective to the sky. it then stayed there for a bit and an airplane flew between us and it and because the sun had only gone down a few hours ago there was still a twindge of light up that high so i could make out that the plane was a plane and the other thing was not. the object had no running lights, no red or green. and then after hovering and changing posisions a few times it wizzed up into the air and just disapeared. and there was nothing obstructing our veiw of the object, no trees or anything. latter after she went home (10 mins after siting) a couple jets wizzed over head.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Hovering, three flashing lights, spinning, wizzed to diff place, hovered, repeat, airplane passed infront of veiw, disapeared after acending

content.detailedDescription:
Jet noise typical of national guard (ng) night practice was heard
in the early evening.  location is in the white mts (nh) moa
(military ops area).  often we hear and see the ng doing night
manuevers - 2 planes chasing - one leading, one  chasing.
usually the planes will do a sequence of s turns, and occansionally
we see the chaff practice (flares are ejected as part of the
manuever practice).  the planes strobes are usually blinking
a short repeating sequence for id.


this evening i ignored what i thought was another ng post-sunset practice
in the moa.  instead my girl friend checked the sky and said
that it does not look like a plane.  none of the normal red-green
and strobe lighting - one object was viewable to the east-south
east direction towards cannon mt.  it had a football like
shape and was bright white.  size was similar to a plane at
1-2 miles in distance.  it was not visible for very long 
(less than 30 seconds) and disappeared in a red flash.

there was the jet noise - i'm assuming the ng was having a
look at the object.
content.summary: Football shaped object, bright white in color, disappeared in a red flash

content.detailedDescription: I was watching stars on the ground with my boyfriend. i was looking at a shooting star, and he was telling me how much he cared about me. i look up at what i thought was a new planet or big star, began moving rapidly. it was much bigger than a plane which was there a few minutes after i spotted it. as i spotted it, i immediately  told my boyfriend to look up because i thought i was hallusinating. he saw it, too and he ran inside to get benoculars. i kept my eye on it the whole time and pulled out my phone to call my dad who is a member of mufon. i explained to him which was it was facing, which was approximately west about 20 degres up, then once i hung up, tried to video tape it, and my phone shut off midway through my second video and i didnt turn it off and its a brand new phone that has not glitched prior to this event. it wasnt comprehending any of the ufo when it was on but i saw a light zip across my screen when my phone turned back on after the event ended and i reviewed the video at home later that night. my boyfriend took out the benoculars he ran inside for , and rested his arm on my shoulder to steady it, and in the benoculars he saw it zipping around in circular motions, and hovering, then it would steady itself and almost seem like a big star, then it would suddenly make movements again, then it would go in a slight horizontal line then spaz out once more and move rapidly all around one piece of the sky. a plane was then moving underneath, and it zipped around the plane. this ovbject appeared to be rotating with the way the lights were. they would stay on approximately a 3-4 second blink, then stop for about 2-3 seconds. it would once again keep up this pattern the entire time. the object appeared grey in color but the blinking lights were bright enough to mask the rest of the object when it was flashing towards us. they were bright white lights, appearing to rotate with the way the lights were faced. i felt shocked and so did my boyfriend. i felt a bit funny when this was all happening, but that could have been from excitement because we did not witness any loss of time. the object zipped towards a pine tree, hovering high over it but in our perspective from the ground appeared to be over it, and then zipped upwards and completely dissapeared. (please note that i do infact have a video on my phone, but the quality did not appear strong enough to track this apparent ufo on my phone, but i am willing to send it in to see if someone can turn the pixels into negative form to destinguish any objects the phone wouldnt catch in regular quality. please contact me if you'd like any of those). thank you very much for your time.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Was watching stars, thought was a star, then moved multiple directions at once. blinking lights, approx2 secs apart, approx 3-4sec blink. hovered, changed direction, spun, have witnesses

content.detailedDescription:
I am former aircrew in the us air force. my husband is currently aircrew in the us air force. we both have exceptional vision, and are trained observers of areal phenomena���

for the last few months, we have observed multiple orange orbs maneuvering over, what we think is the pontiac area of michigan. the orbs move back in fourth in the sky, and periodically dim to black. sometimes they flash between white and red, or vanish instantly. these orbs are extremely bright. we began noticing them regularly, over the past month. we first started seeing them periodically, back in july.

on july 9th (approximate date), four of these orange orbs moved directly over our house at about 1,000 ft. they moved slowly and silently. three stayed in a triangle formation, while the fourth flew behind, varying its direction, just below the others. after moving above us, they slowly dimmed, and appeared as black spheres.

we have been watching for them nightly, and we are able to see them between 3-5 nights out of the week. 

we only have a few good pictures, as we don���t have a camera able to take good night photos, and lately, we���ve been seeing them much farther away. 

my husband has made every effort to debunk these objects as celestial phenomena, however, he cannot do so. a few nights ago, we witnessed these objects in their usual place, moving back and fourth in the southern sky, just above the horizon. when my husband went to work at 5am saturday morning, he saw them maneuvering in various formations in the distance. he watched them until they were obscured by trees.

these objects are not leaving the area. someone with the resources needs to investigate this further. i have never heard of ufos hovering over an area for such a prolonged time. so far, we have had up to 7 witnesses to this phenomena at a single time, all of whom i believe, are willing to discuss the sightings. 

these objects are extremely brilliant; just as bright as jupiter appears in the sky, if not brighter. they are not stars or planets, and they are not any recognizable aircraft.
content.summary: Orange orbs 3-5 times per week

content.detailedDescription:
first of all, my dad was an airline captain for 35 yrs. so the better part of my life has revolved around anything that had to do with aircraft. most of our friends were involved in the airline industry, air shows all over the country, my dad's library is filled with books, tapes, dvd's, pictures, and models of aircraft.  so when i went outside to feed the cat about 10pm a large, bright, led looking light caught my eye to the north.  my first thought it was the "head lights" of a plane until i saw it flash.  as it moved directly over my house i saw it was a triangle shaped object.  it's shape was defined by a soft white glow but bright enough to see clearly it was not any aircraft i'd ever seen before.  in the center of this object was an extremely bright flashing light that looked just like someone flashing an led flashlight.  the light did not flash at random, it was timed perfectly.  i counted the seconds between flashes and it was 3 sec. each time.  there were no blue and red collision lights like on the wings of a plane.  i listened for a sound and there was none.  we live out in the country where it's quiet. i watched the object come from the north and move south at about the speed of a plane.
  my dad had told me in the past about how commercial planes fly directly over our area, as did he when he flew, very low on approach to hartsfield/jackson in atlanta.  so when a plane is heading to the airport in atlanta, it's low and heading north.  all other planes heading east, west and south are very high in altitude, but you can always hear them.  that being said, this object was heading south, and was about the size of a golf ball at arm's length, very big and it was dead silent.  i watched it for about 30 seconds or so until i lost sight of it behind some trees.  but through the trees i could still see the light flash.
  hope to see it again!
content.summary: Lights formed triangle w/ large flashing light in center

content.detailedDescription:
Saw ufo ship and area is all airplane came from same direction.

ufo was emitting tilting light and was standing as it is for more than 1 hour.

but was creating huge sound and sometime humming sound.
content.summary: Heard big sound and found ufo over 2 - 3 km.

content.detailedDescription:
driving to work place. saw a star shaped "balloon" - i thought, "oh a balloon." drove directly beneath it, looking up out my driver's window i saw it was star shaped with 6 or so arms. try as i might, i can't remember exactly how many star-arms it had. 5-7, pretty sure 6 my memory says.

 after passing it, i thought, "oh ****, ufo? maybe. looked like a...Big..Balloon." i am familiar with aircraft, this 'balloon' was the size of a single prop private plane. fluttering, spinning in a general area over the road like a maple leaf in the short time i saw it.

 by the time i was to the work place, i realized it was not a balloon. it was seemingly slowly moving south west to north east. wind is out of the south east at 5-10 mph. it is no bag or balloon. nor a plane, flying to slow and way to erratic for even blimp of any sort.

 i could not find it again, until i walked back outside to get something from my car 2 minutes later. i saw it back over the road, moving (and erratic still) north east. as if it picked up where i left it off.

 i had my work camera with me. took photos. several. i've uploaded the original 3 that show the most detail. it took way to long to traverse the distance it did, about a minute, to have been a helicopter or anything specific. i've chased helicopters before, slow and fast, for video purposes. this was no helicopter. it went out of sight in the haze of the blue sky after i took the photos, i couldn't locate it with my eyes again or camera.

 i'm a camera man, professional. i went to college. i'm familiar with military and civilian planes. i see them on a daily basis. this was no artifact or "bug" in-front of a camera. this was a vehicle of some sort, and likely terrestrial. there is naval air station in the direction it was coming from; on top of which, it was flying to slow even for helicopters (which i have ridden in and seen all my life.)

 i can guarantee you that this was no mistake or miss-judge unless it was a balloon breaking the laws of physics and flying against the wind.
content.summary: Star like silver, flying with wind across/against, erratic

content.detailedDescription: While visiting friends in murrieta, california for the weekend, my father, who lives nearby came over for a couple hours the evening of october 22, 2011. while i was walking him out to his truck at around 10:30 p.M., a faint light moving across the sky caught my eye. i pointed at it so that he could also see.  we both observed as it moved silently in a straight path in a southwest direction. it appeared to be a triangle shape with very faint light orbs omitting from three points. we lost sight of it as it disappeared over the house. my father is a retired navy navigator and pilot of his own single engine airplane. he and i both reported immediatly to the others inside the house. this was the first unidentified object sighting for both of us. being natural skeptics, this has each of us wondering and confused about the event we witnessed.
content.summary: Faint lights in a triangle shape moving across the sky caught my eye. it was a clear night and no sounds came from the object.

content.detailedDescription: Approx. 8:45 p.M. on oct. 22, my husband and i saw a very bright red "glowing" red object in the sky outside of our home.  it was moving north to south laterally but making no sound whatsoever. it resembled a chinese lantern but was much larger (like an aircraft) and higher in the sky.  unlike a glowing lantern or balloon, this object did not ascend.  it moved laterally (south to north).  my husband usually has an answer for everything, but not for this.  unless it was a blimp flying late at night, we are very perplexed!!!  ironically, upon doing a search, there were other similar sightings (the 10/18 munster, in, sighting on your website) and a 10/8 crown point, in sighting found on ufo's northwest.Com.  we would love to know more about this!
content.summary: Observed bright red

content.detailedDescription: At 9:30 the kids started getting texts that the aurora was out- so we went outside to view it. there were 2 bluish/white concentric circles overhead, with bluish/white streamers going off them to the north,east,and west- and blood red patches in the sky to the east, west, and sometimes north. within 10 minutes, the rings started breaking up, and the streamers started blowing apart- but the red in the sky kept changing shape, and moving for about 20 minutes before it started to break up also- within an hour or so, there was nothing left to see. this was not the aurora- i've never seen anything like a blood red sky at night- it was strange.
content.summary: Glowing bluish white

content.detailedDescription: There was an oval shaped green/blue light with an orange tail headed upwards diagonaly.  it only lasted about 10 seconds and then just seemed to vanish once it got higher up.  the lady i was with saw it aswell and my boyfriends father (who was on the other side of town) saw the exact same thing.  at first i thought it may be a meteorite but all the ones i have ever seen have looked as if they were "falling" this did not "fall" this was slowly moving up past the clouds in a diagonal direction and vanished.
content.summary: Ball of light slowly moving diagnaly upwards.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were driving southbound on m-37 at 7:40 in the morning , it was rainy and dark . the sky opened up from the tree line and i pointed to a light in the sky,traveling very fast then taking a sharp left turn heading east . we followed the light, which was just a single star like bright white light , traveling east until we saw what appeared to be an airplane with red and green lights appear from the approximate place where we lost sight of the first single light. i mentioned that it must be what we saw but we both agreed that it was two separate crafts, as we live near a small county rural airport. the space station was supposed to be viewable that morning , but it was rainy and cloudy, so it wasnt the space station under the cloud deck.  this is not the first experience my wife and i have had and also my son has witnessed several sightings in this area. we have even been contacted sfter shining a  laser pointer towards the night sky one evening we flashed the laser twice, and recieved two flashes back from the night sky.... amamzing..... there has been others , please feel free to contact me. thanks for listening. (name moved to fi box) cms 10/25/11 10:30 cst flg
content.summary: Raining and cloudy and we saw a star like light flying in the sky, no other flight lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the swimming pool in the backyard of my home with my neice, 19, and my nephew, 27, when i looked up and saw what looked like a ball of light directly above me theat seemed to pulsate with energy and was moving in a northwest direction.  we watched it for about 20 minutes, and then it changed direction and began to move east, where we observed another one, and then 2 more which just seem to appear out of nowhere.  once they met up, they passed one another, came together as a group and then climbed into the atmosphere and dissapeared. the entire event took about 30 minutes in all.
i live in the flight path to chino airport, which is a small municiple airport, and the ontario international airport, so i am very accustomed to seeing aircraft flying overhead.  they seemed to be flying above the airplanes, which are on descent by the time they fly over my home.
content.summary: Saw what looked like highly reflective metalic spheres above my home

content.detailedDescription: I took this photo for work that i do.  i didn't notice anything that day.  it was the engineers reviewing the photo that saw the object.
content.summary: Possible ufo flying near hemet ca

content.detailedDescription:
Outside on a clear night looking up at the stars as usual when these star-like spheres caught my eye.  originally i was watching a plane fly across the night sky with its blinking lights, then i saw these 2-3 star-like orbs that were at a higher altitude than the plane cross the night sky at about triple the planes speed.  they had no blinking lights or anything that would identify them as an airplane.  they literally looked liked flying stars but had a bit more of a glow to them than the average star, but not the brightest by far.  

  at one point, one or maybe two of them stopped and was still for about 30 seconds.  if i wouldn't have viewed it moving at such speed with my own eyes i would think nothing of it, because it looked like any other star, but then it quickly started moving again with another object just like it by its side.  it was almost like it was moving a bit then blending in, as if not to be seen, i don't know.  

  about 5 minutes into it the airplane was no longer visible or audible, so that's when i confirmed these things put off no sound.  they were really high up too.  after about 8 minutes either they disappeared or i lost them in the night sky.  sorry, no pics or video.
content.summary: 2-3 somewhat glowing star-like objects moving fast with no sound

content.detailedDescription: My mother reported to me that the dog was going crazy barking and running around the hills around the house they could not figure out what was wrong. the next morning her boss called and said that some large lights was by there house and seen by them leaving the ground. and another man had seen these lights and his dogs was going crazy too.This is all out in the middle of no where.
content.summary: Read below
